column1: ['Part two of the PUBG Season 5 Cinematic: Every Battleground has a story and Miramar's is just getting started. Work together as a community to collect data fragments in-game and unlock the rest of the Badlands trailer! #PUBG Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/pubg Stay up to date with PUBG: Website: https://www.pubg.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/pubg Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pubg/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pubg/ About PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS (PUBG): PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS (PUBG) is Battle Royale. The phenomenon that took the world by storm, up to 100 players parachute onto a remote island to battle in a winner-takes-all showdown. Players must locate and scavenge their own weapons, vehicles and supplies, and defeat other players in a visually and tactically rich battleground. Players are forced into closer combat by a shrinking play zone known as The Blue Zone. PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS (PUBG) is available now on PC, Xbox One, and PlayStation 4. Featuring: 1 vs. 100 Battle Royale Combat: Square off against up to 100 players on your own in Solos, with a partner in Duos, or with three friends in Squads. Your Story. Your Battlegrounds: Run ‘n Gun, Camping, Sniping? Every game is a new story, with a beginning, middle, and end. Use the tools you are provided and play your way, no one strategy is guaranteed for survival. Diverse Locations: The regions of Erangel, Sanhok, Miramar and Vikendi await you. Traverse forests, jungles, deserts, and snow blanketed environments with the largest variety of locales in Battle Royale. Personalized Experience: From customizable skins for your outfits and weapons, to rewards for completing your chosen specialties in the Survival and Weapon Mastery progression systems, your PUBG experience is tailored to you.']

column12: ['#PUBG\n\nPUBG Global Championship (PGC) represents the culmination of PUBG Esports’ first official season. PGC will take place across three weekends, starting with a Group Stage (Nov. 8-10) and Semifinals (Nov. 15-17) held at the OGN Super Arena in Manhattan Beach, CA. The competition concludes with the Grand Finals (Nov. 23-24) in Oakland, CA as the top teams face-off at the Oakland Arena for a piece of the guaranteed $2 million USD prize pool and a chance to be crowned the 2019 PUBG Global Champions.']
column13: ['#PUBG Starting Nov. 5, fans will be able to gear up and celebrate PGC with an exciting array of exclusive in-game items. 50% of item sales will be shared with teams participating in PGC 2019. 25% goes to the $2 USD million prize pool, and an additional 25% will be shared with the teams through a ‘Pick’Em Challenge’ Event. Read more: https://www.pubg.com/2019/10/16/top-p...']
column14: ['Get ready for the game-changing features of Season 5! A long-requested Miramar rebalance, new ways to throw loot to your squad- or weapons at the enemy- as well as a deeper look into the history of the Battlegrounds is coming. Learn more in our Patch Notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/10/16/pc-up... #PUBG Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/pubg Stay up to date with PUBG: Website: https://www.pubg.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/pubg Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pubg/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pubg/ About PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS (PUBG): PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS (PUBG) is Battle Royale. column18: ['Explore the famous Mylta Power Plant, pass through Pochinki, check out the old Quarry, and wrap up our journey to the island of Sosnovka in Episode 3 of our Tour Guide series!']
column19: ['Get the inside scoop on the new Survival Mastery system, straight from the PUBG developers!']
column20: ['Cross Platform Play is now available! Console Update 4.3 allows both our console players to be matched into the same matchmaking pool. The update also brings Survival Mastery, the DBS, and more!\n\nhttps://www.pubg.com/2019/09/25/conso...']
column21: ['Light those jack-o-lanterns and reload your shotguns because new Halloween costumes are dropping onto the Battlegrounds.']
column22: ['Update 4.3 is now live! This patch includes the new Survival Mastery progression system, the new care package DBS shotgun, and more! \n\nRead the full patch notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/09/18/pc-up...']
column23: ['The new DBS shotgun is coming to a Care Package near you. Learn more: https://www.pubg.com/2019/09/18/pc-up...']
column24: ['We are excited to introduce the Survival Mastery system, where players can develop their less-than-lethal aspects of PUBG gameplay.']
column25: ['Step into the helmet and discover the different ways an intense PUBG scenario can play out in the debut episode of Put Yourself in My Helmet.']
column26: ['Learn about the structure of your PUBG squad and get ready to make a push for victory.']
column27: ['Gotcha! This Nugget of the Week honors those kills that took EVERYONE by surprise.']
column28: ['Explore the eastern shores of Erangel in Episode 2 of our Tour Guide series!']
column29: ["A storm is raging on the Battlegrounds. Erangel's overcast weather can now produce a variety of other weather conditions on the island, from thunderstorms, to fog, to heavy winds, and even hail."]
column30: ['PC Update 4.2 is now live. This patch brings updated Erangel weather along with a number of quality of life improvements to the gameplay and user experience. \n\nFull patch notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/08/14/pc-up...']
column31: ['PUBG: Season 4 drops August 27 and Cross Platform Play Coming Soon!\nRead more: https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2019/08/1...']
column32: ['Celebrate Rabbit Season with this new skin set! Available with PC Update 4.2.']
column33: ['Welcome to the Battlegrounds Tour Agency’s\ntour of Erangel!']
column34: ['At PUBG Nations Cup, only the most talented battle royale players have a chance to take on the world\'s best for a shot at glory and the $500,000 prize pool. Watch live August 9 - 11. https://www.pubgesports.com/']
column35: ["Watch the world's best teams compete at the PUBG Nations Cup on August 9 - 11. Stay tuned to pubgesports.com for more info."]
column36: ["Learn to play like the pros with PUBG Mechanics. This week, we're covering all the info you need to make the perfect grenade throw."]
column37: ['Epic music, new visuals and the adrenaline you love. Drop into new Erangel and experience PUBG like never before.']
column38: ['Discover how the PUBG team brought Season 4 and the newly updated Erangel to life in this Behind The Scenes documentary.']
column39: ['Tune-in tomorrow for a full length look at the development process behind the Erangel update and Season 4.']
column40: ['Earn new outfits, skins, and more with Survivor Pass 4: Aftermath. Now available on PC. Learn More: https://pass.pubg.com/en']
column41: ['Watch the world\'s best teams compete at the PUBG Nations Cup August 9 - 11. Stay tuned to https://www.pubgesports.com/ for more info.']
column42: ['PUBG SEASON 4 unveils a stunning visual update for Erangel and brings the all-new Survivor Pass 4: Aftermath with new missions and rewards. Full Patch Notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/07/17/pc-up...\n\n*Survivor Pass holders mean every player who plays PUBG Season 4 with normal pass as well as premium pass']

column54: ['A new update to an old favorite. Gas Cans now explode!']
column55: ['Learn about the various updates and quality of life changes the PUBG Console team has been working on.']
column56: ['Players feeling froggy for a fight will now have the chance to call down an armor plated amphibious assault BRDM-2 by using the Flare Gun!']
column57: ["We're excited to announce Striking Distance, a new PUBG game development studio headed by industry luminary Glen Schofield."]
column58: ['Patch 30 is now LIVE on PC! Drop in for the amphibious vehicle the BRDM-2, the high powered Deagle, ledge grab, and an update that makes Gas Cans EXPLODE when shot!']
column59: ['Find new ways to fight, jump, grab, get up, and go with our new Ledge Grab feature!']
column60: ['The Deagle is a new handgun that deals the strongest pistol damage with great muzzle velocity. Available on all maps with PC Patch #30. Full Patch Notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/06/19/updat...']
column62: ['Enjoy this sneak peek at the upcoming visual update to Erangel.']
column63: ["Hear from PUBG Executive Producer TS Jang as he guides you through our vision for the game and some of the exciting things we're working on, including information on how you can help us.\n\nRead the full Dev Update here: bit.ly/2WekGpe"]
column64: ["Things get spicy on this week's episode of Nugget of the Week."]
column65: ['Share the loot, the kills and the cars with Tactical Map Markers, a whole new way to coordinate with your squad.']
column66: ['PC Update #29 includes Tactical Map Markers. Vikendi loot rebalancing, and more. \n\nRead the full patch notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/05/15/updat...']
column67: ['The best clips from the PUBG community this week. Enjoy!']
column68: ['Enjoy another installment of our favorite PUBG clips in this episode of Nugget of the Week!']
column69: ['Weapon Mastery is a brand new progression system that rewards players for becoming experts with their favorite weapons. This video will walk through how you can shoot your way up the levels to gain recognition, track your progress, and earn that sweet, sweet loot.']
column70: ['PC Update #28 is now available! This patch includes the new Weapon Mastery system, Erangel loot rebalance, bug fixes, and more. \n\nRead the full patch notes here: https://www.pubg.com/2019/04/17/updat...']
column71: ['Master your weapons. Unlock new rewards. PUBG\'s new Weapon Mastery progression system is now live on PC. Learn more: https://www.pubg.com/2019/04/15/intro...']
column72: ['Vikendi is cold, but you can look hot with Survivor Pass 3: Wild Card. Accomplish mission objectives, earn new gear, and Dress to Kill.\npass.pubg.com']
column73: ['Miramar awaits! Dress to Kill with desert-themed gear from Survivor Pass 3: Wild Card! Drop in to earn them today.\nRead more: https://pass.pubg.com']
column74: ['Our series celebrating the PUBG experience is back! Enjoy this Nugget of the Week episode starring your favorite streamers.']
column75: ['Earn the proper attire for your next trip to Erangel with Survivor Pass 3: Wild Card. Drop in today and get yourself Dressed to Kill!\nLearn more: https://pass.pubg.com/']
column76: ['Earn the perfect gear for a summer trip to Sanhok with Survivor Pass 3: Wild Card. Drop in today and get yourself Dressed to Kill!\nLearn more: https://pass.pubg.com/']
column77: ['PUBG esports fans can show their appreciation for their favorite players and teams by picking up exclusive FACEIT Global Summit items now available in PUBG. \n\nWatch the FACEIT Global Summit on April 16 at https://www.pubgesports.com/']
column78:
["Enjoy some good laughs with the April Fools' edition of our Nugget of the Week series!

Submit your highlight clips to NOTWSUBMIT@PUBG.COM for a chance to be exclusively featured on Nugget of the Week!
Make sure to include your handle along with your submission."]
column79: ['Survivor Pass 3: Wild Card is now live. It includes over 60 new rewards to earn, improved missions to test your skills, and more! \n\nLearn more: https://www.pubg.com/']
column80: ['PC Patch #27 brings the brand new Survivor Pass 3: Wild Card! Additionally, we’ve added the new MP5K SMG to Vikendi, bumped up the loot on Erangel, and made lots of changes to weapon balance. \n\nRead the full patch notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/03/20/updat...']
column81: ['The MP5K is a brand new sub-machine gun chambered for 9mm ammunition. It s exclusive to Vikendi and will be available on PC with Patch #27.\n\nRead full notes: https://www.pubg.com/2019/03/20/updat...']
column82: ['On March 23, PUBG celebrates its two-year anniversary since releasing to the public, and what an amazing two years it has been!\n\nhttps://www.pubg.com/2019/03/22/pubg-...']
column83: ['During the development of Vikendi, the PUBG team visited Slovenia, the country that inspired the visual design of the map. The Slovenian tourism board greeted the team with its own rendition of the Vikendi lobby music.']
column84: ["Flare Guns are now available in public matches and can be found as a rare item spawning in the world. If you're lucky enough to find a Flare Gun, fire it directly into the air after the initial blue zone has closed to call in a special care package."]
column85: ['Welcome to Patch #26! You'll see great new additions to the game, such as 2 brand new Vikendi-exclusive vehicles and a rare new item we're introducing to public matches for the first time! Find out more about the Replay Editor here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xo7Pt... Read the full patch notes here: https://www.pubg.com/2019/02/20/test-...']
column86: ['PC Patch #26 introduces a new Replay Editor system with improved UI and features. Try it out now on the PC Test Server. \n\nFull patch notes: https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column87:
['Introducing the Zima, a 4-person vehicle coming exclusively to Vikendi.

It may have a lower top speed than the snowmobile or snowbike, but the Zima boasts for much better cover and can tackle the snowy slopes with equal ease. 

Available now on Test Servers with PC Patch #26.']
column88: ['Canted Sight allows users to quickly switch between the 1x Canted Sight and your normal upper rail sight. This gives users a direct advantage when switching between ranged and close quarters combat as they no longer have to lose vision of opponents to access their inventory and swap out sights.']
column89: ['The battlegrounds of Vikendi just got a bit more hauntingly beautiful. Land, loot, and survive, all under the wondrous light of the moon. Available now on PC Live Servers. See Patch Note #25: https://www.pubg.com/2019/01/23/test-...']
column90: ['Along with loot balance changes, we’re introducing some great new content to Vikendi with Patch #25, including a new weapon, attachment, and the long-awaited Moonlight weather setting.\n\nRead the full patch notes here: https://www.pubg.com/2019/01/23/test-...']
column91: ['The Bizon is quieter and quicker than other SMGs, and comes equipped with a monstrous 53-round default capacity. Pick one up today, now on test servers. Arriving with Patch Update #25. \n\nSee Patch Note #25: https://www.pubg.com/2019/01/23/test-...']
column92: ['First time dropping into Vikendi? Buckle up for a series of quick tips on surviving Vikendi's cold terrain and competition. This final episode of the series features tips for using the terrain as cover to secure the win. Squad up. Beat the Cold. Learn more: https://vikendi.pubg.com']
column93: ['Dash your way through situations in deep snow with the brand-new Snowbike, available exclusively on Vikendi. The Snowbike is a 2-person vehicle that substitutes the motorbike. Available now on Test Servers with PC Patch #25.\n\nhttps://www.pubg.com/2019/01/23/test-...']
column94: ['What\'s new on Vikendi? Finders Keepers. Losers Weepers. \n\nhttps://vikendi.pubg.com/']
column95: ['Vikendi and Survivor Pass: Vikendi are now live for players on Xbox One and PlayStation 4. \n\nLearn more: https://vikendi.pubg.com/']
column96: ['First time dropping into Vikendi? Buckle up, for a series of quick tips on surviving Vikendi's cold terrain and competition. This episode shows how your squad can work as a unit to track enemies in the snow. Squad up. Beat the Cold. Learn more: https://vikendi.pubg.com']
column97: ['Dino Park brings out the best in PUBG streamers. This Nugget of the Week episode is dedicated to Vikendi first impressions. Enjoy! https://vikendi.pubg.com/']
column98: ['Tae Hyun Kim, PUBG\'s Character Art Director and Tae Hyun Kim, PUBG\'s Head of the Art Department answer your questions about Vikendi! \n\nhttps://vikendi.pubg.com/']
column99: ['First time dropping into Vikendi? Buckle up, and listen to a series of quick tips for surviving Vikendi's cold terrain and competition. This episode discusses ways in which squads can use the many small towns in Vikendi to achieve victory. Squad up. Beat the Cold. Learn more: https://vikendi.pubg.com']
column100: ['Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays from the PUBG team. https://vikendi.pubg.com/']
column101: ['Winter has arrived. With Update #24, we’re debuting our new 6×6 snow-themed map, Vikendi! Additionally, we are overhauling our replay system and parachute mechanics. Full patch notes here: https://www.pubg.com/2018/12/07/viken...']
column102: ["Every day is a snow day! Blast through Vikendi's steely atmosphere and competition in style, with exclusive rewards unlocked by our Survivor Pass: Vikendi.\n\nFor more details, visit the Survivor Pass: Vikendi official website: pass.pubg.com"]
column103: ['Update #24 Introduces a brand new, overhauled parachute system for PUBG, which allows you to glide or dive during freefall, improves animations, and also lets you cut your chute before hitting the ground. Learn more: https://www.pubg.com/2018/12/07/viken...']
column104: ['300+ missions to accomplish. 100+ levels to climb. Brand new and exclusive rewards to unlock. The Survivor Pass: Vikendi brings new and exciting challenges for players to take on, and will be accessible to all players for 10 weeks. A Premium Survivor Pass is also open for purchase through Steam or the in-game store, for bigger and better rewards! Learn more about Missions: https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780... For more details, visit our Survivor Pass: Vikendi official website: pass.pubg.com']
column105: ['Get a behind-the-scenes look at creation of Vikendi, PUBG\'s new snow map, from the team who made it. Learn more: https://vikendi.pubg.com\n\nPlay Vikendi right now on PC Test Server! Launches on PC Live Server Dec. 19 and in January for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.']
column106: ['Battle it out in a flurry of snow with the new G36C Assault Rifle and Snowmobile vehicle, found exclusively on Vikendi. https://vikendi.pubg.com/\n\nAvailable now on the PC Test Server. Launches on PC Live Server Dec. 19 and in January for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.']
column107: ['Nugget of the Week is a new series by PUBG celebrating our favorite dinner-worthy - and not-so-dinner-worthy - gameplay moments. The premiere episode is all about Vikendi. Discover the new joys, and hilarious sorrows of the treacherous icy wonderland! https://www.pubg.com/']
column108: ['Don\'t be afraid to jump into the driver\'s seat! Get the lowdown on PUBG\'s vehicles in this episode of Quick Tips. \n\nLearn More: https://www.pubg.com/']
column109: ['What is PUBG? Pick up the basics of PlayerUnknown\'s Battlegrounds in this episode of Breakdown. Learn more: https://www.pubg.com/']
column110: ['Welcome to the ultimate subzero life-and-death fight. This is Battle Royale. This is Vikendi. Learn more: https://vikendi.pubg.com Play Vikendi right now on PC Test Server! Launches on PC Live Server Dec. 19 and in January for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.']
column111: ['New Map. New Terrain. New Ways to Survive. Introducing Vikendi. \n\nVikendi officially launches for PC on Dec. 19 but you can play it starting tonight on PC Test Servers!  Vikendi will arrive on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One in January.']
column112: ['Pre-order PUBG on PS4 and get two exclusive Naughty Dog skins: The Nathan Drake Desert Outfit from the Uncharted series, and Ellie’s Backpack from The Last of Us.\n\nPre-order: https://store.playstation.com/en-US/p...']
column113: ['Prepare to drop, loot, and fight your way to the top in PUBG for PS4! \n\nLearn More: https://www.pubg.com/']

This patch includes a brand new full-auto pistol, the new Conquest Mode Custom Game setting, improvements to custom games in general, and other bug and quality of life fixes. \n\nFull patch notes: https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column118: ["Guess what's for tonight's dinner? Courtesy of... the Survival Squad of Horrors.\n\nHappy Halloween, everyone! Come haunt the battlegrounds with us soon, with our new Halloween skins."]
column119: ['The Skorpion is a new full-auto weapon pistol that will be available on all maps. It uses 9mm ammo and is ideal for close, early game encounters. Arriving with PC Patch #23.']

column122:
['A mere second can mean the difference between winning and "Better luck next time!"

Now you never have to waste a moment in the heat of battle, with our newly updated wheel menus for quick access to healing and throwable items.

Available now on Live Servers.']
column123:
["Don't just talk a big game anymore. Walk the walk, and prove it. 
The long awaited Rank System finally launches today. Log in, qualify, and rank up - all the way from BRONZE to GRANDMASTER. 

Available now on Live Servers."]
column124: ["Put everything you've learned to the test. More information on the new Rank System coming soon!"]
column125: ["Drop into this week's Event Mode and test out the Flare Gun. This event is intended to be a Beta test for the item. Should we bring the Flare Gun into the regular game setting? Let us know what you think! \n\nThe event will run for 10 days, beginning on September 21 and ending on October 1."]
column126: ['Tonight's harvest moon signals good fortune and good times with your family and friends. Join us in celebration of the Chuseok season, and enjoy a prosperous harvest of new skins and chicken dinners to go around in our new Limited Time Event. https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column127: ['Tonight's harvest moon signals good fortune and good times with your family and friends. Join us in celebration of the Mid-Autumn season, and enjoy a prosperous harvest of new skins and chicken dinners to go around in our new Limited Time Event. https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column128:
['The in-game marker system has received a new upgrade in Update 21.

Players now have the option of temporarily marking a direction while outside of the map screen. This allows you to quickly communicate with your team without losing focus of your target.

To utilize this new addition to the marking system, simply aim your camera where you’d like to place your mark and click the middle mouse button while holding the ALT key. This will display a temporary marker on the compass, letting your team know the general direction you’re trying to point towards, but without giving an exact location.']
column129: ['Work on your sharpshooting. Learn to stick the landing. Ride and race with the squad. Our upcoming Training Mode is an expansive playground, with room to practice and explore your skills. Available on Live Servers 9/12. https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column130: ['Ride in style with the Tukshai, available exclusively on Sanhok. The Tukshai is a 3 person vehicle that substitutes the UAZ, Dacia and Minibus. Try it out now on Test Servers with PC Patch #21. \n\nhttps://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column131: ['Ruins is a multi-tiered labyrinth located on Sanhok. The many entrances and exits make it a tactical playground for combatants. You can drop into Sanhok on Xbox One with the 1.0 update. Available now! \n\nhttps://sanhok.pubg.com/']
column132: ['The Laser Sight attaches to the lower rail of most SMGs, ARs, and DMRs, but works particularly well with pistols in early-game. \n\nThe Laser Sight will arrive with PC Patch #21! It will be available on Test Servers, coming soon to Live Servers.']
column133: ["A new 7.62mm Assault Rifle, the Mutant may be just what you've been looking for in a dependable mid-range weapon.\n\nTry out the new Mk47 Mutant, available on Test Servers with PC Patch #21. Coming soon to Live Servers."]
column134: ['Paradise Resort is an abandoned vacation spot located on Sanhok. It's a prime location for loot making it one of the hottest drops on the map. Sanhok is now available on Xbox One with the 1.0 update. https://sanhok.pubg.com/']
column135: ["PUBG 1.0 Update for Xbox One arrives on September 4. We're celebrating launch by exploring the Hot Drop spots of Sanhok. Watch this video to pick up tips about the Caves."]
column136: ['This is more than just a shooting range. It\'s a 2x2km map to practice your parachuting, master parkour obstacle courses, and more. Welcome to PUBG\'s Training Mode. \n\nhttps://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column137: ["As part of our Fix PUBG initiative, we've introduced an updated feedback system for reporting cheaters and hackers. Players will now receive a message when their reports have resulted in action. Learn more details in this video."]
column138: ['With PC Patch #20, we’re introducing new options for TPP aim camera position settings. Read here for the full patch notes: https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column139: ['The Scooter is a new vehicle coming with PC Patch #20. It is available exclusively on Sanhok. Compared to the motorbike, the Scooter has lower speed and an increased turning circle, but the same HP. Full patch notes: https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column140: ['The Beryl M762, which is a new versatile Assault Rifle which spawns on Erangel, Miramar, and Sanhok.\n\nhttps://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column243: ['Play Event Mode PGI 2018 this weekend only! Read the full details here: https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780...']
column270: ['At PGI 2018, we're rolling out new systems to improve the PUBG esports viewing experience. For match schedules: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/sch... To watch the show once it's live: https://watchpgi.pubg.com']
column271:
['Team Liquid, WTSG, the Pittsburgh Knights are three teams competing in the PUBG Global Invitational from the EU region. Watch this short documentary about their journey through the qualifying rounds! 

See them in action July 25 - 29 during PGI! 

pgi.playbattlegrounds.com']
column272: ['PGI 2018 is now less than 2 weeks away and we’re continuing to announce the teams representing each area of the world. Lastly, we’re announcing the two teams joining the Invitational from the KR region! Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin Watch Live: https://www.twitch.tv/playbattlegrounds https://www.youtube.com/PUBG https://mixer.com/PUBG']
column273: ['PGI 2018 is now less than 2 weeks away and we’re continuing to announce the teams representing each area of the world. Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin Watch Live: https://www.twitch.tv/playbattlegrounds https://www.youtube.com/PUBG https://mixer.com/PUBG']
column274: ['The QBU is a new 5.56mm DMR coming exclusively to Sanhok. It features a bipod, which will greatly reduce recoil when shooting from prone status. The QBU replaces the Mini14 on Sanhok.\n\nThe QBU will be available for testing very soon!']
column275: ['The Rony is a new pickup truck that can only be found on Sanhok. This truck holds up to 4 passengers and excels at moving across Sanhok\'s hilly landscapes.The Rony is one of the larger vehicles on Sanhok, so it can be used for cover as effectively as transportation!\n\nhttp://sanhok.playbattlegrounds.com/']
column276: ['PGI 2018 is now less than 2 weeks away and we’re continuing to announce the teams representing each area of the world. Today, we’re announcing the three teams joining the Invitational from the EU region! Congrats to Team Liquid, WTSG, and the Pittsburgh Knights. See you in Berlin July 25 - 29. \n\nhttps://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/']
column277: ['Congrats to The Chief Exports Club, Savage Esports, and Oyun Hizmetleri for besting the competition and earning the right to represent their regions at the PUBG Global Invitational in Berlin. Watch them battle for the ultimate Chicken Dinner July 25 - 29. Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin']
column278: ['The road to PGI 2018 continues! Introducing the three teams attending the invitational from North America: Ghost Gaming, Team Gates, and Honey Badger Nations. Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin']
column279: ['Congrats to NAVI and AVANGAR for besting the competition and becoming the two teams from the CIS region to qualify for the PUBG Global Invitational in Berlin. Watch them battle for the ultimate Chicken Dinner July 25 - 29. Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin']
column280: ['Introducing the three winners of the Asia PGI 2018 qualifiers: AHQ, MiTH, REFUND GAMING. These teams have earned a spot at the PUBG Global Invitational in Berlin on July 25 - 29! Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin Watch Live: https://www.twitch.tv/playbattlegrounds https://www.youtube.com/PUBG https://mixer.com/PUBG']
column281: ['The PUBG Global Invitational is almost here! The best PUBG teams in the world have battled to be here. Are you ready? Tune in on July 25 – 29. #PGI2018 Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin Watch Live: https://www.twitch.tv/playbattlegrounds https://www.youtube.com/PUBG https://mixer.com/PUBG']
column282: ['4AM and OMG will be the two teams representing China at the PUBG Global Invitational in Berlin on July 25 - 29. Watch this short documentary about their journey to PGI 2018! Learn more and buy tickets: https://pgi.playbattlegrounds.com/ #PGI2018 #RoadtoBerlin']
column283: ['When our teams in Seoul, Korea and Madison, WI began working on Sanhok, they wanted to make a smaller map that would be the most intense Battle Royale experience possible. Our new mini-documentary, the Making of Sanhok, will give you a behind-the-scenes look at the development of this new map from concept to release.\n\nLearn more: http://sanhok.playbattlegrounds.com/']
column287: ['To celebrate the launch of Sanhok, here are some our favorite highlights from the four rounds of testing. Thanks to all players who provided feedback to help shape the final release!\n\nhttp://sanhok.playbattlegrounds.com/']
column288: ['SURVIVE A SMALLER WORLD. FIGHT A BIGGER BATTLE.100 combatants drop into a 4km x 4km island. Only one leaves. Learn more: http://sanhok.playbattlegrounds.com/']
column290: ['Smaller world. Bigger battles.\n\nSanhok is coming on June 22, 2018.']

column299: ['War is PUBG’s most deadly Event Mode yet. Join one of three 10-man squads to compete for dominance over a small slice of Erangel. Whenever you die, you’ll reappear in a plane and plummet once again into the mayhem. First team to get 200 points wins. Check below for the full details, and let us know what you think! https://steamcommunity.com/games/5780... EVENT SCHEDULE STARTS: April 12, 7pm PDT / April 13, 4am CEST / April 13, 11AM KST ENDS: April 15, 7pm PDT / April 16, 4am CEST / April 16, 11AM KST']
column300: ['Today, March 23, is the one year anniversary of PUBG’s Early Access launch on Steam. Brendan “PLAYERUNKNOWN” Greene (Creative Director, PUBG) and CH Kim (CEO & Executive Producer, PUBG) have a message for all the members of the PUBG community who have supported us over this time: Thank you! Follow PUBG: Twitter: https://twitter.com/pubattlegrounds Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playbattlegr...']
column301: ['PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS PC 1.0 Launch is coming in less than 24 hours. The week leading up to 1.0 has been full of excitement and great content. Watch some of the wildest moments we’ve compiled for you! #ThisIsBattleRoyale Available on Steam Early Access: http://store.steampowered.com/app/578... For the latest updates, follow us on: Twitter: https://twitter.com/PUBATTLEGROUNDS Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playBATTLEGR... Forums: http://forums.playBATTLEGROUNDS.com Video Edited by Dearsomeone: YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/dearsomeone Twitter: https://twitter.com/dearsomeone Featured: Technosh: https://www.twitch.tv/tecnosh mrKerij: https://www.twitch.tv/Mrkerij WaLLeShow: https://www.twitch.tv/Walleshow kylank_: https://www.twitch.tv/Kylank_ HavocNinja37: https://www.twitch.tv/Havocninja37 SchnkrTV: https://www.twitch.tv/Schnkrtv Sombrero: https://www.twitch.tv/Sombrero hailchristopher: https://www.twitch.tv/hailchristopher shroud: https://www.twitch.tv/shroud BingeHD (賓哥): https://www.twitch.tv/BingeHD HCJustin: https://www.twitch.tv/HCJustin hav0kstv: https://www.twitch.tv/hav0kstv Anthropic: https://www.twitch.tv/Anthropic GabrielCRO (가브리엘): https://www.twitch.tv/Gabrielcro Spir4l: https://www.twitch.tv/Spir4l ALFPLAYS: https://www.twitch.tv/alfplays deadmau5: https://www.twitch.tv/Deadmau5 TSM_aimPR: https://www.twitch.tv/tsm_aimpr Painkiller: https://www.twitch.tv/Painkiller']
column302: ['PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS PC 1.0 Launch is coming December 20th. In the weeks leading up to 1.0, the test servers are rife with new content. We’re pleased to bring you our new map, Miramar, a new desert landscape with new weapons, and new vehicles. Watch the first reactions, and then come see it for yourself. Miramar, now playable while test servers are live. #ThisIsBattleRoyale Tweet us your clips with the hashtag #ThisIsBattleRoyale for a chance to be featured in a highlights video. column309: ['Xbox One console launch exclusive. A last-man-standing shooter, PLAYERUNKNOWN’S BATTLEGROUNDS is the ultimate life and death fight, as it drops players on a realistic 8 x 8 km island with visuals that showcase Unreal Engine 4’s capabilities. Starting with nothing, gamers must fight to locate weapons, vehicles and supplies as they strive to be the lone survivor. Twitter: https://twitter.com/pubattlegrounds Forums: http://forums.playbattlegrounds.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playbattlegr...']
